document_data.name: Zukimoto Chikitada
document_data.Personality: Zukimoto was deeply loyal to his master but never admitted it to anyone. He cared a lot about Hiro's safety. He always looked as if everything displeased him. At times of laughter, he only showed a less grunting face.
document_data.Activities: Zukimoto was the right-hand man, aide, and secretary of the lord [[Hiro Matsu]]. He also acted as leader of his bodyguards.
document_data.History: Zukimoto went together with his master to [[Aru]].
